title: The Shores of the Cosmic Ocean
episode_desc: Carl Sagan examines our planet's place in the universe by leading us on a journey from Earth to Deep Space.
show_desc: Astronomer Carl Sagan leads us on an engaging guided tour of the various elements and cosmological theories of the universe.

title: One Voice in the Cosmic Fugue
episode_desc: Carl Sagan examines the origin, development, and complexity of life on Earth and speculates on the possibility of life developing elsewhere in the universe.
show_desc: Astronomer Carl Sagan leads us on an engaging guided tour of the various elements and cosmological theories of the universe.

title: Harmony of the Worlds
episode_desc: After briefly looking at the pseudoscience of astrology, Carl Sagan examines the history of astronomy from ancient times through Ptolemy to Johannes Kepler.
show_desc: Astronomer Carl Sagan leads us on an engaging guided tour of the various elements and cosmological theories of the universe.

title: Heaven and Hell
episode_desc: Carl Sagan examines the nature of comets before turning to a close look at the planet Venus.
show_desc: Astronomer Carl Sagan leads us on an engaging guided tour of the various elements and cosmological theories of the universe.

title: Blues for a Red Planet
episode_desc: Carl Sagan looks at the search for life on Mars from the speculations of Percival Lowell and H.G. Wells to the arrival of the Viking probes.
show_desc: Astronomer Carl Sagan leads us on an engaging guided tour of the various elements and cosmological theories of the universe.

title: Travellers' Tales
episode_desc: Carl Sagan looks at the planets Jupiter and Saturn by examining the work of Galileo, Huygens, and the Voyager probes.
show_desc: Astronomer Carl Sagan leads us on an engaging guided tour of the various elements and cosmological theories of the universe.

title: The Backbone of Night
episode_desc: Carl Sagan looks at the work of ancient Greek scientists and astronomers including Thales, Anaximander, Democritus, and Pythagoras.
show_desc: Astronomer Carl Sagan leads us on an engaging guided tour of the various elements and cosmological theories of the universe.

title: Journeys in Space and Time
episode_desc: Carl Sagan explains scientific concepts like relativity and examines the possibility of time travel.

title: The Lives of the Stars
episode_desc: Carl Sagan examines the life cycle of stars from their creation to their deaths.

title: The Edge of Forever
episode_desc: Carl Sagan focuses on the origin of the universe by discussing the Big Bang, Galaxies, Dimensions, and the expansion of the universe.

title: The Persistence of Memory
episode_desc: Carl Sagan examines life on earth discussing genes, DNA, the brain, and human social development.

title: Encyclopaedia Galactica

title: Who Speaks for Earth?
